Features include premium hardwood floors, plantation shutters, dual-pane windows, USB outlets, modern light fixtures, raised garden beds, a Tesla solar power system, and a 2-car garage with an EV charger. Conveniently located near major freeways for easy commutes to high-tech companies, and close to the historical Alum Rock Park, SJ Country Club golf course, and shopping centers, this home offers the perfect blend of luxury and convenience. Don't miss the opportunity to make this extraordinary property your own!
